protocol.name: P-GSE44344-1
protocol.text: RMA algorithm using RobinA software (PMID:22684630) ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA signal

protocol.name: P-GSE44344-2
protocol.text: Plants were harvested at 10am in the morning, 2h after the start of the day.

protocol.name: P-GSE44344-3
protocol.text: Seeds were sown in 6-cm diameter pots containing moisted Arabidopsis soil. The seeds were stratified at 4°C in the dark for 2 days and then the pots were moved in a growth chamber at short photoperiodic conditions (8h light 16 h darkness) with 18°C in the night and 22°C in the day.

protocol.name: P-GSE44344-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from whole 5-week old plants using the RNeasy kit (Qiagen). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry. RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix Arabidopsis Genome GeneChip arrays.

protocol.name: P-GSE44344-8
protocol.text: Plants were treated in the darkness at 5% O2 v/v in air for 4h at 10am in the morning, 2h after the start of the day
